Make sure you use the right namespace for DefaultAzureCredential at the top of yoursource file:PythonAn Azure Cognitive Search service contains one or more indexes that provide persistentstorage of searchable data in the form of JSON documents. (If you're brand new tosearch, you can make a very rough analogy between indexes and database tables.) TheAzure.Search.Documents client library exposes operations on these resources throughtwo main client types.
SearchClient helps with:Searching your indexed documents using rich queries and powerful datashapingAutocompleting partially typed search terms based on documents in the indexSuggesting the most likely matching text in documents as a user typesAdding, Updating or Deleting Documents documents from an indexSearchIndexClient allows you to:Create, delete, update, or configure a search indexDeclare custom synonym maps to expand or rewrite queriesMost of the SearchServiceClient functionality is not yet available in our currentpreviewSearchIndexerClient allows you to:Start indexers to automatically crawl data sourcesDefine AI powered Skillsets to transform and enrich your datafrom azure.
